administration of parenteral antibiotics, uterotonics, 
and anticonvulsants; manual removal of placenta;

Comprehensive care interventions include all 
basic functions, plus obstetric surgery and blood 
transfusion.
In both Uganda and Zambia, only a few 
middle-level health facilities provide full BEmONC 
services. Nearly all hospitals (and a few high-level
